heading: Precision AI for Breast Cancer Diagnostics

clinical.title: The Clinical Challenge
clinical.text: Detecting lesions in dense breast tissue is often complicated by overlapping anatomical structures, subtle tissue variations, and high inter-patient variability, which can lead to delayed or missed diagnoses.
